name: Angler fish
description: This animated angler fish comes in four colors each with three animations, swim, swim snapping and idle. The file formats included are HD spritesheets, HD png body parts, vector body parts, and a Spriter file. You can use the Spriter file to export higher or lower definition spritesheets or key frames. You can export up to a maximum of 1800 pixels per keyframe without losing resolution although the supplied spritesheets are less.
